Performers > Kiritake Ikka

Kiritake Ikka

(桐竹一嘉)

Dates:
'1987-'

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)

Performances:

January 1990: The Romance in the Gay Quarters

July 1990: The Bloodshed at Ise

September 1990: The Adachi Plain in Oshu

April 1991: A Tragic Love Triangle

December 1991 Bunraku Kanshō Kyōshitsu: The Amorous Courier

November 1992: The Love Suicides at Amijima

February 1993: The Courier for Hell

April 1993: The Tycoon's Exploit

May 1993: The Tycoon's Exploit

September 1993: The Summer Festival at Naniwa

February 1994: The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo

August 1994: Pilgrimage to the West

February 1995: The Drum of the Waves of Horikawa

August 1995: The Battles of Genji and Heike

September 1995: The Yaguchi Ferry

January 1996: The Amorous Courier

July 1996: Sasayaki no take

February 1996: The Love Suicides at Amijima
